channel.title: Mackenzie on Wheeler Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Mackenzie on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: Howard Robinson Wheeler (52 Ancestors, #9 Howard Wheeler)
item.description: Howard Robinson Wheeler was born 05 Jun 1894 in Derby, Connecticut. Howard was the son of John Edward Wheeler and Carra Inez Tuttle. While born in Derby, Connecticut, Howard was raised in Holyoke, Massachusetts. Howard lived in Holyoke until his 23rd birthday when he joined the Army. Recruited from Holyoke, Massachusetts, Howard served in the Army from 22 Jun 1917 to 13 Mar 1919. During his time in the Army in the Medical Detachment, 70th Acty, C.A.C., Howard attained the rank of sergeant. Upon completion of his two year commitment to the Army, Howard returned to Holyoke.

Recruited from Holyoke, Massachusetts, Howard served in the Army from 22 Jun 1917 to 13 Mar 1919.
